owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

getMatch((address,uint256,uint256,uint25.notice: Return recommended match. TODO Probably too optimistic matching, and might want to hash the listings for cheaper comparison ...

sendEvent(string).notice: Fire of an event that NFT Gateway can listen for using a subscriber

updateMatch((address,uint256,uint256,uin.notice: Update registry with match. TODO Probably too optimistic matching, and might want to hash the listings for cheaper comparison ...

userdoc.notice: Finds another NFT that is just like the listed one
